document_data.name: Knurl
document_data.mainbody: '''Knurl''' was one of the twelve moons of [[Garden]] in [[Realmspace]].
document_data.Description: Like most of Garden's moons, Knurl was larger than its parent, with a diameter of {{SI|60|mi|k|long=yes}}. Knurl was a sphere composed of marble with swirls of color. In places, chunks of the surface were broken, and molten limestone oozed from the core.
document_data.History: Some had discovered a way of harvesting the "liquid marble" and molding it into sculptures.
